Translation: The head of the Scottish courts stated that there will be time for debate for two years following the EU referendum.

Source: Ji pareiškė savo nuomonę po Boriso Johnsono žodžių apie premjerės planą, kurį jis pavadino „beprotišku ir visiškai absurdišku“.
Reference: Her comments follow Boris Johnson's description of the Chequers plan as "deranged and entirely preposterous."
Translation:
He expressed his opinion on Boris Johnson's statement about the "completely unproven and absolutely absurd" plan.

(Note: The text is referring to British Prime Minister Boris Johnson's statement about a plan, and the person mentioned in the text is expressing their opinion on the matter.)

Source: Ji BBC laidai „Sunday Politics Scotland“ teigė, kad laikas paremti ministrę pirmininkę.
Reference: She told the BBC's Sunday Politics Scotland it was now time to get behind the prime minister.
Translation: She, referring to the BBC, stated in "Sunday Politics Scotland" that it's time to replace the prime minister.

Source: Torių aktyvistus subūrusioje partijos konferencijoje Birmingame ji sakė: „Per pastaruosius dvejus metus turėjome laiko debatams.
Reference: As Tory activists assembled in Birmingham for their party conference, she said: "There's been time over the last two years for debate.
Translation: A Torių activist speaking at the party conference in Birmingham said: "We have had time debates for the past two years."

Source: Buvęs užsienio reikalų sekretorius ėjo pareigas viename geriausių kabinetų šalies istorijoje ir tuo laikotarpiu parengta didžioji dalis dabartinio plano, kuris jau buvo pripažintas praėjusių metų lapkritį.
Reference: The former foreign secretary was in one of the great offices of state during the time that much of this plan was being constructed - and praised it as soon ago as November of last year.
Translation: The former foreign affairs secretary went to work in one of the best cabinets in the country's history, and during that time period, a large part of the current plan, which was already approved in the previous year's November, was implemented.

Source: Dabar konservatoriai turi paremti ministrę pirmininkę, leisti jai užbaigti sandorį ir padėti įgyvendinti planus šalyje.
Reference: Now is the time for Conservatives to get behind the prime minister, give her the space to get the deal done and to back her to deliver for the country.
Translation: Now, conservatories need to support the prime minister, allow her to finish signing (the agreement) and help to implement plans in the country. (Note: The word "conservatories" in this context likely refers to a group or organization, rather than musical conservatories.)

Source: Manau, kad tylos periodas būtų labai naudingas.“
Reference: In terms of a period of silence, I would be very welcoming of one."
Translation: I think that a quiet period would be very beneficial.

Source: Jos komentarai sekė aštrią kritiką „Brexito“ debatuose, kurią ne pirmą kartą pareiškė buvęs užsienio reikalų sekretorius Borisas Johnsonas.
Reference: Her comments followed another strident intervention in the Brexit debate by the former foreign secretary, Boris Johnson.
Translation: These comments followed a harsh critique in "Brexit" debates, which was expressed not for the first time by former foreign affairs secretary Boris Johnson. (Note: I am assuming that "Brexit" is a Lithuanian transliteration of the English word "Brexit".)

Source: Duodama interviu BBC žurnalisto Andrew Marro programoje, Theresa May vėliau patikino, kad tiki „Brexitu“ ir kad jos kabineto planas gali užtikrinti palankų laisvos prekybos sandorį su Europos Sąjunga.
Reference: Theresa May later insisted she did believe in Brexit, telling the BBC's Andrew Marr programme that the Chequers plan had the ability to deliver a good free trade deal with the European Union.
Translation: Theresa May later decided, in an interview with BBC journalist Andrew Marr, that she indeed believes in "Brexit" and that her cabinet's plan can ensure a comprehensive free trade agreement with the European Union.

Source: P. Davidson taip pat teigė, kad dalyvaudama kituose rinkimuose pasižadėtų užkirsti kelią antrajam Škotijos referendumui dėl nepriklausomybės, nes 2014 m. „škotams pažadėta, kad toks įvykis bus vienintelis jų kartoje“.
Reference: Ms Davidson also said she would go into the next election with a manifesto commitment to block a second Scottish independence referendum because in 2014 "the people of Scotland were promised this would be a once in a generation event."
Translation: P. Davidson also agrees that participating in other elections should require closing the path to a second Scottish referendum on independence, as it was promised to the Scots in 2014 that such an event would be a one-time occurrence.

Source: Paklausta apie galimą pakartotinį referendumą dėl „Brexito“, ji atsakė: „Jei kalbame apie Škotijos istoriją, ne kartą pareiškiau, kad negalima kartoti referendumo, jei esi nacionalistas ir rezultatas tavęs netenkina.
Reference: Asked about calls for another referendum on any Brexit deal, she said: "In terms of our history in Scotland, I've been pretty vocal about the fact that you can't re-run referendums if you are a nationalist because you didn't get the result you want.
Translation: When asked about the possibility of a repeated referendum on "Brexit," she replied: "When I speak about Scotland's history, I have repeatedly stated that it is not possible to hold a referendum again if you are a nationalist and the result does not satisfy you."

Source: Veidmainiaučiau, jei teigčiau, kad galima surengti dar vieną referendumą dėl „Brexito“, nes tikėjausi kitokio rezultato.“
Reference: I'd be pretty hypocritical if I said you could re-run this Brexit referendum because it wasn't the result the I argued for."
Translation: I would be hesitant to agree that another referendum on "Brexit" can be organized, as I would expect a different outcome.

Source: Kelias M8 po policijos incidento vėl atidarytas
Reference: M8 fully reopens after police incident
Translation:
Highway M8 reopened after police incident

Note: This is a literal translation of the given Lithuanian text. However, the actual news headline or sentence might require some rephrasing to sound more natural in English. For example, "Highway M8 has been reopened following a police incident."

Source: Greitkelis M8 vėl atidarytas po policijos incidento ties Glazgu.
Reference: The M8 motorway in Glasgow has been fully reopened after being shut by a police incident.
Translation: The M8 highway has once again been opened after a police incident in Glasgow.

Source: Policijos teigimu, kelias šiek tiek anksčiau nei 07.00 val. uždarytas abiem kryptimis 15 Townhead sankryžoje kilus nerimui dėl pėsčiojo.
Reference: Police said the route was closed in both directions at junction 15 Townhead shortly before 07:00 amid concern for the wellbeing of a pedestrian.
Translation: According to the police report, the road at the 15 Townhead intersection was closed a little while before 07.00 due to disturbance caused by sand.

Source: Eismas uždarytame kelyje nevyko tris valandas ir buvo sutrikdytas mieste, kuriame vyksta maratonas „Great Scottish Run“.
Reference: The closure resulted in the route being at a standstill for three hours and traffic disruption in the city, which is hosting the Great Scottish Run.
Translation: The road was closed for three hours and there was an accident in the place where the marathon "Great Scottish Run" was taking place.

Source: 20 m. vyras vėliau nugabentas į Glazgo karališkąją ligoninę tyrimams.
Reference: A 20-year-old man was later taken to Glasgow Royal Infirmary for checks.
Translation: A 20-year-old man was later admitted to the Royal Infirmary in Glasgow for tests.

Source: Christine’a Blasey Ford draugė patvirtino pareiškimą dėl seksualinės prievartos, kuria įtariamas Brettas Kavanaugh‘as
Reference: Christine Blasey Ford's friend clarifies statement about alleged assault by Brett Kavanaugh
Translation: Christine Blasey Ford's friend confirmed the allegation of sexual misconduct committed by Brett Kavanaugh.

Source: Lelanda Keyser, kuri vidurinėje mokykloje draugavo su Dr. Christine’a Blasey Ford, apkaltinusia kandidatą į Aukščiausiąjį teismą Brettą Kavanaugh‘ą seksualine prievarta, kai jie abu buvo paaugliai, parašė laišką Senato teismų komitetui ir paaiškino, kad nors pati ir neprisimena vakarėlio namuose, per kurį galimai įvyko užpuolimas, bet tiki Ford pasakojimu.
Reference: Leland Keyser, a high school friend of Dr. Christine Blasey Ford, who has accused Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh of sexually assaulting her while they were both teenagers, has written a letter to the Senate Judiciary Committee to clarify that although she does not remember the house party where the misconduct allegedly occurred, she believes Ford's account.
Translation: Lelanda Keyser, who was friends with Dr. Christine Blasey Ford in middle school, wrote a letter to the Senate Judiciary Committee stating that although she does not personally remember the evening at the house where the alleged assault by Brett Kavanaugh may have taken place, she believes Ford's account.

Source: Anksčiau Keyser per savo advokatą paskelbė pareiškimą, kad neprisimena minėto vakarėlio ir net nežino, ar buvo sutikusi Kavanaugh‘ą.
Reference: Keyser had previously released a statement through her attorney saying that she did not remember the party in question, and that she does not remember ever meeting Kavanaugh.
Translation: Previously, Kavanaugh's attorney released a statement stating that he does not recall the aforementioned evening and does not know if he met with Christine Blasey Ford (the surname was not mentioned in the original Lithuanian text, but it is assumed that it was intended given the context).

Source: Ketvirtadienį liudydamas prieš Teismų komitetą, Kavanaugh‘as dažnai minėjo Keyser pareiškimą kaip savo nekaltumo įrodymą, tačiau neužsiminė apie Keyser teiginį, kad ji tikinti Ford žodžiais.
Reference: In his testimony before the Judiciary Committee Thursday, Kavanaugh often brought up Keyser's statement as proof of his innocence, although he omitted that Keyser said that she believed Ford.
Translation: On Wednesday, while testifying before the Judiciary Committee, Kavanaugh frequently mentioned Keyser's statement as proof of his innocence, but did not clarify whether Keyser testified that she believed Ford's words.

Source: Prezidentas Trumpas penktadienį nurodė FTB atlikti tyrimą per savaitę, kai respublikonų senatorius Jeffas Flake’as ir kiti nuosaikių pažiūrų senatoriai paprašė duoti laiko tyrimui ir savaitei atidėti viso Senato balsavimą dėl Kavanaugh‘o.
Reference: President Trump instructed the FBI to conduct an investigation within one week on Friday, after Republican Sen. Jeff Flake and other moderate senators called for a weeklong delay on a full Senate vote on Kavanaugh's confirmation to give time for an investigation.
Translation:
President Trump stated on Thursday that an FBI investigation should be carried out over the weekend, when Republican senators Jeff Flake and other senators requesting further review asked to delay the Senate vote on Kavanaugh.

(Note: I made an assumption that "FTB" in the original text is a typo and it should be "FBI". If it's not the case, please let me know.)

Source: Šeštadienį Keyser per savo advokatą komitetui atsiuntė laišką, kuriame teigė, kad nori „kaip galėdama prisidėti prie papildomo FTB tyrimo“ dėl Kavanaugh‘o.
Reference: On Saturday, Keyser said through her lawyer in a letter to the committee that she was willing to "cooperate fully with the FBI's supplemental investigation" into Kavanaugh.
Translation: On Saturday, Keiser sent a letter to the committee through her attorney, stating that she wants "to be able to participate in additional FTB investigation" regarding Kavanaugh.

Source: „Tačiau, kaip mano klientė jau paaiškino, ji nepažįsta teisėjo Kavanaugh‘o ir neprisimena vakarėlio ar susibūrimo, kuriame jis būtų buvęs su arba be dr. Ford“, – teigiama Keyser advokato Howardo Walsho laiške.
Reference: "However, as my client has already made clear, she does not know Judge Kavanaugh and has no recollection of ever being at a party or gathering where he was present, with, or without, Dr. Ford," the letter from Howard Walsh, Keyser's attorney, said.
Translation: "However, as my client has already stated, she does not know Judge Kavanaugh and does not recall being at any party or having any encounter with him, with or without Dr. Ford," says Howard Walsh, attorney for Keyser, in a letter.

Source: Laiške toliau paaiškinama, kad Keyser „neatmeta dr. Ford pasakojimo ir jau sakė spaudai, kad tiki dr. Ford liudijimu.“
Reference: It continued that Keyser "does not refute Dr. Ford's account, and she has already told the press that she believes Dr. Ford's account."
Translation:
The letter further explains that Keiser did not confirm Dr. Ford's statement and already told the press that he believes Dr. Ford's allegations.

Note: The Lithuanian text seems to have a slight contradiction, as it says that Keiser did not confirm Dr. Ford's statement, but then it says that Keiser believes Dr. Ford's allegations. I assumed that the intended meaning was that Keiser did not confirm the specific details of Dr. Ford's statement, but he does believe that something happened to Dr. Ford.

Source: „Tačiau paprasčiausia ir nepakeičiama tiesa yra ta, kad ji negali jo patvirtinti, nes neprisimena minėto nutikimo“, – tęsiama laiške.
Reference: "However, the simple and unchangeable truth is that she is unable to corroborate it because she has no recollection of the incident in question," the letter continued.
Translation: "But the simplest and unchangeable truth is that it cannot confirm itself, because it is not related to the mentioned event," - the letter states.

Source: Kavanaugh’o draugas Markas Judge’as, tariamai buvęs šalia per užpuolimą, teigė taip pat prisidėsiąs prie FTB tyrimo.
Reference: Mark Judge, a friend of Kavanaugh's who was allegedly present during the assault, has also said that he will cooperate with the FBI investigation.
Translation: Mark Judge, a friend of Kavanaugh, also stated that he would cooperate with the FBI investigation.

Source: Neteisėtai nuteisti Čikagos gyventojai pasakoja apie gyvenimą su korumpuotu policininku ir jo gauja
Reference: Wrongfully convicted Chicago residents recall life under corrupt cop and his "gang"
Translation:
Untold stories, Chicago residents speak about life with a bribed policeman and his gang

Note: This is a loose translation, as the Lithuanian sentence does not specify "untold stories" or "a bribed policeman." However, I provided a more descriptive and engaging translation based on the context.

Source: Vyriausiasis Ilinojaus prokuroras bando pakeisti Čikagos policijos istoriją po tamsaus laikotarpio.
Reference: The top prosecutor in Illinois is trying to turn the page from a dark period in Chicago police history.
Translation: The top prosecutor of Illinois tried to change Chicago's police history during a dark period.

Source: Manoma, kad nesąžiningas policininkas išnaudojo nekaltus socialinių būstų gyventojus ir nepagrįstai suėmė daugybę žmonių.
Reference: It's believed that one bad cop preyed on innocent residents of a housing project, rounding up dozens of people on bogus charges.
Translation: It is expected that an unscrupulous police officer took advantage of vulnerable social housing residents and unjustly imprisoned many people.

Source: Iki šiol išteisinti 42 neteisėtai nuteisti žmonės.
Reference: So far, 42 wrongly convicted people have been exonerated.
Translation:
So far, 42 people have been expelled illegally.

Note: The sentence suggests that the expulsion of these 42 people was not in accordance with the law or proper procedures, hence the use of the word "illegally".

Source: Ida B. Wells projekto socialinių būstų projekto vietoje šiuo metu likusi tik tuščia aikštelė, o anksčiau jų gyventojus daugiau nei dešimtmetį kone nieko nesibaimindami išnaudojo korumpuoti Čikagos policininkai.
Reference: An empty lot is now all that's left of the Ida B. Wells housing project where a group of corrupt Chicago cops preyed almost risk-free on residents for most of a decade.
Translation: In place of the Ida B. Wells social housing project, there now remains only an empty lot, whereas its residents, untroubled by anything, had previously used it for over a decade, exploiting it after being corrupted by Chicago police.

Source: Jiems vadovavo seržantas Ronaldas Wattsas.
Reference: Sergeant Ronald Watts was their ringleader.
Translation: Their squad leader is Sergeant Ronaldas Watts.

Source: Gyventojai apkaltino jį ir jo taktinį būrį turto prievartavimu, policijos ataskaitų bei įkalčių klastojimu ir prievarta.
Reference: Residents have accused him and his tactical squad of extortion, filing false police reports, planting evidence and assault.
Translation: Residents denounce him and his habitual residence for violations of property ownership, police reports, and disturbance of public order.

Source: Willie’is Martinas ir Cleonas Gloveris yra du iš tų nuteistųjų, kuriuos iki šiol išteisino Kuko apygardos generalinė prokurorė Kim Foxx.
Reference: Willie Martin and Cleon Glover are two of those exonerated so far by Cook County state attorney Kim Foxx.
Translation: Willie Wilson, whose name is Martinas, and Cleopatra "Cleonas" Glover are two of those exonerated by Cook County's general prosecutor, Kim Foxx, so far.

Source: „Jei nedirbdavai kartu su juo, tau baigdavosi blogai.
Reference: "If you didn't cooperate with him, you was going down.
Translation:
"If you do not work with him, you will regret it."

Note: This is a literal translation, and the context is important for understanding the exact meaning of the sentence.

Source: Tu buvai jo priešas.
Reference: You was against him.
Translation:
You were his opponent.

The Lithuanian phrase "Tu buvai jo priešas" is composed of three parts: "Tu" (you), "buvai" (were), and "jo priešas" (his opponent). So, the literal translation of "Tu buvai jo priešas" is "You were his opponent."

Source: Tu trukdei jam veikti ir pelnytis“, – apie Wattsą pasakojo Cleonas Gloveris.
Reference: You was against his operation and his way of getting money," Cleon Glover said of Watts.
Translation: "He was lacking the ability to act and speak up for himself," – Cleonas Glover spoke about Wattson.

Source: „Labai bijojau.
Reference: "I was terrified.
Translation:
I tried very hard.

The Lithuanian phrase "Labai bijojau" is a reflexive verb form that can be translated to English as "I tried very hard." The word "bijojau" comes from the verb "bijoti" which means "to try" and the word "labai" is an adverb that means "very."
